quest.name: A Missing Tooth
journal: Margyt wants to know where Ayleth is.
Ayleth never returned to the Convictory after you gave her the dragon fang and Margyt is getting worried. Return to Red Rim, where you last saw her, and see if she is still in the area.
You do not see Ayleth, but there are plenty of dragons, which you dispatch in short order. Continue looking for the missing girl.
There is still no sign of Ayleth at Red Rim. Return to the Convictory and break the news to Margyt.
The news worries Margyt. Where is Ayleth and what does she plan on doing with the dragon fang?

dialogue.name: MARGYT
dialogue.text: So, where is Ayleth, anyway? You said you found her, but I still haven't seen her.

dialogue.name: MARGYT
dialogue.text: Huh? She took the dragon fang and headed back here before you? Well...she never came back here. What's she playing at this time!?

dialogue.name: MARGYT
dialogue.text: Please, head back to Red Rim. It's the last place she was sighted. Maybe she's still around there somewhere. Please hurry!

dialogue.name: MARGYT
dialogue.text: Please go back to Red Rim and see if Ayleth is still there.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: There is no sign of Ayleth.

dialogue.name: MARGYT
dialogue.text: Did you find Ayleth? Was she there!?

dialogue.name: MARGYT
dialogue.text: No sign of her? Hmmm. I see. What in the seven hells is she thinking...?

dialogue.name: SOLDIER01892
dialogue.text: After a day on patrol, ain't nothin' better than a nice cold glass of aleâ”€even in this weather.

obj.n: He Who Would Not Be Denied
